name: CommPy
body:
### Introduction
CommPy is an open source software toolkit in python implementing digital communication algorithms.

### CommPy related Articles
* [Plotting Trellis Diagrams with CommPy in Python](http://veeresht.info/blog/plotting-trellis-diagrams-commpy/)
* [The Viterbi Algorithm - Illustrated!](http://veeresht.info/blog/viterbi-algorithm-illustrated/)
* [Carrier Frequency Offset in Single Carrier and OFDM Systems](http://veeresht.info/blog/cfo/)

### Documentation
An initial version of the CommPy documentation can be found here:
